lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because:
I worked in the welfare/government assistance field for 30 years, and met thousands of families who were having a hard time financially, and were trying to get back on their feet.  Kiva allows me to help people who want to better themselves and their communities. It's a way for me to give back a little as gratitude for the many blessings I have.
It's also an excellent way to teach my grandchildren about helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: In the United States, when families experience conditions which make it impossible for them to totally support themselves, the government makes available the means to provide basic food, shelter and clothing, as well as medical care.  Also offered are educational and employment opportunities so that the family can become self-sufficient.  My job was director of a large agency that administered these aid programs.

lenders.name: Jeffrey Lewis Knapp
lenders.loan_because: After we read Bill Clinton’s book “Giving”, we decided to become involved with Kiva. Tarina Brooke Knapp Foundation supports educational scholarships and working to reach personal goals. Kiva.org offers impressive opportunities, in agreement with the basic goals of our TBK foundation, for people to better them selves, grow, and advance as individuals or groups of individuals to achieve awareness, fulfillment and better realization through understanding. Thank you Lord. Thank you Jesus.
lenders.occupational_info: I work full time with a local blood bank collecting life saving blood each day from volunteer donors within the state. The recipients of the blood, the patients, they are important, they need the blood, and they make my work worth the effort and the time, long hours, wonderful people. I am also a platelet donor and a long time blood donor. Donating blood is good for your body & your community. Blood donation is volunteer work. If you have a resume, include your blood donation efforts in detail on your resume under community service. Donating blood every eight weeks to help in your community is a grand magnificent service and a tremendously rewarding experience.

lenders.name: Jo S
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in supporting women wishing to become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: Although I am retired I am still very busy with family, travel and hobbies.

lenders.name: Don B
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people who help themselves.

lenders.name: Armando
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Independent contractors do many things...

lenders.name: Murray & Janet
lenders.loan_because: We want to share what God has blessed us with.
lenders.occupational_info: Murray has been cutting hair for over 35 years.  Janet works part time in a farm & home store.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Agricultural Scientist/University Professor

lenders.name: Shylock
lenders.loan_because:
Like God, I want to help people who want to help themselves. I don't get out much, and it's hard to identify worthy entrepreneurs in my area who don't need a lot. I am starting my own private school in Mexico and I know how hard it can be to get started in a developing country. I, however, get a great deal of non-monetary support from my family.

This plan promotes human dignity all around. There is dignity in lending in a manner that is devoid of the profit motive, and this organization makes it possible for even modest middle class earners to partake of this reward. More importantly, it allows poor entrepreneurs to improve their lot, but exacts no affective tribute. On the contrary,  by presenting them with an opportunity to make good on a reasonably attainable commitment, it enhances individual and group pride. 

It is indeed a win-win proposition.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to local Mexicans.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Miguel
lenders.loan_because: it´s everyone´s responsability, for me a big opportunity, to contribute with small action to play an important role on helping others to develop and improve their quality life.
lenders.occupational_info:
Brand Space=Nice place
CenárioUrbano is a Portuguese Company who intends to develope and find solutions that may strengthen and improve the architectural qualification of underprofited urban areas, with visibility of the brand, offering different alternatives to the usual media.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I'm hoping that this money will have a realistic impact on the lives of people who receive it around the world, and will eventually have the effect of improving and sustaining developing economies.

lenders.name: Kinsan
lenders.loan_because: this money gives hope. When one gets out of the rut, it breathes new life to families and the future generation. Children will get to go to school, and through education, one is then totally out of poverty, and become the next generation of leaders.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I like to work through Kiva because I can  loan money directly to people whose circumstances speak to me.  I hope their futures will be brighter due to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband is an engineer and I work as a conductor on a freight railroad.  We load trains with coal to send to power plants to produce electricity.

lenders.name: Libby
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed and want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: retired school counselor

lenders.name: Seacia
lenders.loan_because: I am on the board of my mother's non-profit and I know how much every donation counts.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a photographer.  My favorite photographs are those that I take when I am traveling and learning about new places.

lenders.name: Dwight
lenders.loan_because: It's always better for people to improve their circumstances by entrepreneurship--not charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to set up and run their own and others' businesses.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help someone.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others and I want to change the current image of the US. The Bush years has made me embarrassed of my country. Most Americans would rather be part of a solution  than bomb, murder and torture others.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair, set up and configure computers, small networks, backup and wireless solutions.

lenders.name: R J
lenders.loan_because: I have been to Tanzania and seen the suffering that goes on.  My family is planning to go again.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been working on getting a library in my town.  I have worked on it for about 4 years.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I simply want to help.  I have had times in my life when I needed a helping hand.  Sometimes I got it, sometimes not.  I know what it's like to be turned down.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but I stay busy teaching classes in alcohol and drug addiction recovery.  I have had several careers ranging from topical fish farming to marketing director in several mid - size firms.

lenders.name: Alex and Debbie
lenders.loan_because: We are very blessed and love to give back!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother and my husband is in sales.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help make a difference in the life of people in need.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: Mothers need to help each other.  What an ingenious use for the internet!

lenders.name: JoAnne
lenders.loan_because: I have been self employed for many years and understand the challenges I faced starting and growing a business in the US. I have great compassion for those in countries fighting global poverty and yet have courage to work and start businesses.  If they succeed, everyone wins.
lenders.occupational_info: I help other business owners to market and create brand awareness for their product and services.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because:
I particularly want to encourage businesses that help "reduce, reuse, recycle", such as those working with used clothing, repairing appliances, or selling spare parts. This helps to reduce waste around the world!

I tend to shun businesses such as beauty salons since I view them as being somewhat frivolous.

lenders.name: Rowan
lenders.loan_because: My grandma gave me a gift certificate
lenders.occupational_info: I'm interested in science and technology

lenders.name: JoAnn
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a chemistry lab where I work with chemicals and set up experiments for students to do so they can learn.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: my small loan creates big changes in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach elementary aged students.

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.occupational_info: Event Signage people.

lenders.name: Napoleon
lenders.loan_because: It's my nature to make it rain.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: The way to help people throughout the world is to supply them with the means to become self-sustaining.  Money to start a business enables a person to be able to provide a sustainable income to support the family with the essentials needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Nutritionist by education and profession.  My work has been teaching people how to make food choices that positively impact their health.  I currently started a business as a Pet Sitter where I go to people's homes when they are away and take care of their pets.

lenders.name: James & Alice
lenders.loan_because: "The social message of the Gospel must not be considered a theory, but above all else a basis and a motivation for action..."  - Pope John Paul II (1991)

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I believe that our united similarities as a people are and will always be far greater than our distinguishing differences. What happens to one of us affects the others and if we can improve the life of just one person, is that not building a better world?

lenders.name: Leon
lenders.loan_because: I believe we should share our good fortune with others to help bring peace and prosperity on a personal level.
lenders.occupational_info: Pharmaceutical development. I work on developing new drugs to treat cancer and rare diseases.

lenders.name: Enya Isabel
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have the opportunity to realize their dreams and because I care.  Givers Gain!

lenders.name: Thuy
lenders.occupation: operation assistant for Supporting Fund for poor w

lenders.name: william
lenders.loan_because: Money is like manure - it's no good unless you spread it around.

lenders.name: Janet and Doug
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to help oher people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children ages 7-18 with learning diabilities.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: Someone needs it.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I have been so blessed.

lenders.name: Jonathan and Tonia
lenders.loan_because: We wish to make a positive impact on the world, and to set a good example for our son and daughter

lenders.name: Alessandra
lenders.loan_because: my mother always tells me that in many places in the world, people are poor.  She always tells me to be generous, and to do my very best to help. Btw she is from Peru.
lenders.occupational_info: Tengo 10 anos y mi madre es del Peru.

lenders.name: Erik and Mary
lenders.loan_because: It is one of the best ways to help someone who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: A lot of rejection and some hardship but worth every moment.

lenders.name: Ashton
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is to try to get a business off the ground. Sometimes, even a little help makes all the difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a writer and make movies for children.

lenders.name: Hays Fam
lenders.loan_because: We are a blessed family and consider it a priviledge to extend a helping hand to those who simply need a boost to better their lives.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I loan with the hope that the money will provide an opportunity for people in developing countries to live healthy and comfortable lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a volunteer in my neighborhood and for C.E.R.T.

lenders.name: Jesse & Carmen
lenders.loan_because: Given a chance, people will amaze you with their ambition, ingenuity and determination. For many people around the world, just a (relatively) little bit of money can open up a universe of opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: We enjoy our work. We also continually seek ways to be involved in our community and to support efforts to make the world a more peaceful and cleaner place for all.

lenders.name: JoJo
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead workshops for people in business who want to learn to be even more effective leaders and team-workers.

lenders.name: kelly
lenders.loan_because: i am inspired to give back to our world
lenders.occupational_info: i have lived in different parts of the world doing health education, currently I work for a university and help teach doctors and nurses about tuberculosis

lenders.name: Brian

lenders.name: maria

lenders.occupational_info: I help people create and maintain their wealth.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: It gives me great joy to share the blessings God has entrusted to me!

lenders.name: Lisa and Walt

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: microcredit loans are proven to help people kick start or grow their businesses. I also like being part of such a positive global initiative to combat poverty in the developing world.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: heather
lenders.loan_because: I can...and I want to teach my young daughter that small acts of kindness can make all the difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Cameron
lenders.loan_because: I love.
lenders.occupational_info: I create artwork and websites.

lenders.name: Jen and Maddy

lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a senior in college studying business. After I graduate I am going to attend law school.

lenders.loan_because: We all need to come together on this planet. A little help can go along way and mean the world to our friends and neighbors !
